words.sentence: 残念 … 何が
words.translatedSentence: Too bad… What?

words.sentence: 夢 か 何か 寝不足 だ な
words.translatedSentence: Is it a dream or something like lack of sleep?

words.sentence: 登って くる
words.translatedSentence: Come up

words.sentence: 疲れ た 眠る
words.translatedSentence: Tired

words.sentence: 残念 だ … 失敗 し た …
words.translatedSentence: I'm sorry ... I failed ...

words.meaning: to become numb, to go to sleep (e.g. a limb)
words.sentence: なんか 痺れる ん だ
words.translatedSentence: I'm paralyzed

words.meaning: to be still half asleep, to be half awake, to be not yet quite awake
words.sentence: 寝ぼけ て コード で 縛ったり する から よ
words.translatedSentence: I'm going to sleep and tie up with code

words.sentence: いや 全然
words.translatedSentence: No at all

words.meaning: improper conduct (e.g. between man and woman), indiscretion
words.sentence: これ は 何 か の 間違い という か なんと いう か その …
words.translatedSentence: This is something wrong or something ...

words.sentence: あー あ 壮絶 な 寝ぼけ 方 だ な
words.translatedSentence: Oh, it's a fierce sleep

words.meaning: strange, odd, peculiar, weird, curious, queer, eccentric, funny, suspicious, fishy
words.sentence: あの 変 な 生き物 は 本当 に 入り込ん で い たり し て
words.translatedSentence: That weird creature really got in

words.sentence: でも 電源 切って おい た し その …
words.translatedSentence: But I turned off the power and that ...

words.sentence: ありゃ 相当 怒ってる ね
words.translatedSentence: I'm quite angry

words.meaning: to get angry, to get mad
words.sentence: ありゃ 相当 怒ってる ね
words.translatedSentence: I'm quite angry

words.sentence: うん ちょっと 気分 も 悪い し
words.translatedSentence: Yeah, I feel a little sick

words.sentence: でも 昨夜 の あの 変 な 生き物 と 関係 が ある と し たら
words.translatedSentence: But if it was related to that strange creature last night

words.sentence: 避ける な よ
words.translatedSentence: Don't avoid

words.meaning: contacting, (making) contact, getting in touch, communication, correspondence, call, message
words.sentence: 学校 から 連絡 が あった ん だ けど 今日 早退 し た そう ね
words.translatedSentence: I was contacted by the school, but I left early today.

words.sentence: あら おかわり なの 珍しい わ ね
words.translatedSentence: It's unusual

words.meaning: to get better, to get well, to recover (from an illness), to be cured, to be restored, to heal
words.sentence: 治った ん だ よ
words.translatedSentence: It was cured

words.meaning: hospital, clinic, doctor's office, doctor's surgery, infirmary
words.sentence: 病院 で 調べ られ たら
words.translatedSentence: If you are investigated at the hospital

words.sentence: 普通 に 喋れ る よう に なった ん だ な
words.translatedSentence: I was able to speak normally

words.meaning: to examine, to look up, to investigate, to check up, to sense, to study, to inquire, to search
words.sentence: 病院 で 調べ られ たら
words.translatedSentence: If you are investigated at the hospital

words.meaning: true character, true form, true colors (colours), identity, truth (of a mystery, phenomenon, etc.), origin
words.sentence: あの ヘビ みたい な の が お前 の 正体 な ん だろ
words.translatedSentence: It's your identity like that snake

words.meaning: to take (by force), to take away, to snatch, to steal, to rob (someone) of, to dispossess of, to deprive of, to usurp
words.sentence: 脳 を まさか お前 次 は 僕 の 脳 を 奪う つもり じゃ
words.translatedSentence: I'm going to take my brain next time

words.sentence: 脳 を 奪う のに 成功 し て たら どうなって た ん だ
words.translatedSentence: What would happen if I succeeded in taking my brain

words.sentence: 偶然 だ 君 を 選ん だ わけ で は ない
words.translatedSentence: I didn't choose you by chance

words.sentence: 偶然 だ 君 を 選ん だ わけ で は ない
words.translatedSentence: I didn't choose you by chance

words.sentence: お互い 損 じゃ ない
words.translatedSentence: It's not a loss

words.sentence: お互い 損 じゃ ない
words.translatedSentence: It's not a loss

words.meaning: freely, at liberty, at will, as one likes
words.sentence: 君 が 自由 に 動かせ る よう に 回路 を 繋ぐ
words.translatedSentence: Connect the circuit so that you can move freely
